personal.name: Philippe Gael
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.tagline: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences.

about.heading: Building real-world business solutions
paragraphs: I am a software engineer with strong hands-on experience in ERPNext/Frappe development, mobile applications, and system integrations.
I work on real-world business solutions including payroll systems, HMRC RTI integrations, POS real-time systems, and data-driven mobile applications.
I prefer clean architecture, scalable solutions, and practical problem-solving.

items.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and customized ERPNext modules for HR, Payroll, Sales, and Inventory
Built a complete UK Payroll RTI solution integrated with HMRC
Designed Postman collections for RTI testing (TPVS, ETS, LTS)
Implemented permission logic, advanced filtering, and custom workflows in Frappe

items.title: UK Payroll RTI Integration
items.description: Complete RTI application supporting FPS, EPS, NVR, and EYU. HMRC-compliant XML generation and submission with error handling and validation.

items.title: Real-Time POS Order System
items.description: Node.js TCP server with MongoDB. React Native TCP client for live order updates. Kitchen and table status synchronization.

items.title: Smart Sales Manager
items.description: Sales dashboard with analytics, customer and order management with secure login and role-based access.

items.title: Delivery & Map-Based Apps
items.description: Live order tracking using Express JS_map & geolocator. Draggable sheets with markers and order lists.

items.title: ERPNext Customizations
items.description: Advanced search and filtering logic, role-based permissions for ESS and sales users, custom list pages and navigation.

contact.heading: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm currently open to freelance and contract-based work. If you have a project in mind, let's talk!
